name: Shred & Butter
description: Learn and try out new skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles. Participants should have their own equipment. - Helmets are mandatory to participate. - Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
fullDescription: Learn and try out new skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles. Participants should have their own equipment. - Helmets are mandatory to participate. - Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
whatTheyOffer: Learn and try out new skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles. Participants should have their own equipment. - Helmets are mandatory to participate. - Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
